job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Blockworks is a fast-growing financial media brand that delivers breaking news and premium insights about digital assets to millions of investors.
Our editorial content, newsletters, podcasts and events provide investors with the critical analysis and information they need to make smarter decisions about digital assets.
About the Role
As our second engineering hire, you’ll have a unique opportunity to own several different projects and help us build the engineering team and tech stack.
We’re looking for a Software Engineer who has a passion for building web experiences users will love, has strong design sensibilities, and is comfortable working with both frontend and backend code.
This is a unique opportunity to influence the product and technical direction of a fast-paced, growing startup.
We want to find the best person for the role regardless of where you are located. This role is open for candidates who are working remote as well as candidates who prefer to work from our New York City office.
What You’ll Do
Plan, shape, and build new product features from start to finish: through conception, research, implementation, and maintenance
Examples of product features include: build data metrics into our website, build a referral campaign on top of our newsletter, increase site speed, integrate 3rd party services into our website and newsletter, build podcast pages that automatically update upon release of shows, create pages for crypto charts, and more.
Help build both our tech stack and our engineering team
Collaborate with our marketing and editorial teams to deliver and learn from experiments that move core business metrics
Get to know the Blockworks reader to understand key points in their journey and uncover insights that will drive activation and engagement
What We’re Looking For
A couple of years of full stack experience
Skilled in HTML, CSS and PHP
Experience building custom WordPress themes
Demonstrated ability to make beautiful websites and web apps
Well-versed in modern frontend frameworks and best practices, including a robust knowledge of web application performance
Comfortable making decisions in ambiguous situations with changing or unknown requirements
Prior experience in a small startup or incubator environment
Strong project scoping and project management skills
Our current website is on WordPress but you’ll have the opportunity to expand off of WordPress
Bonus: media or publisher experience, experience making product decisions based on data and A/B testing; SEO knowledge.
Salary & Benefits
A commitment to an open, inclusive, and diverse work culture
Competitive pa
14 weeks of fully paid parental leave
Medical, dental, and vision insurance
401(k) plan
Remote work-station stipend
Training & development
Learning stipend
Team happy hours and outings (even while remote!)
Generous vacation and PTO policy
Commuter benefits
Next Steps
The next step would be to complete a project-based assessment on the Hatchways platform.
We know that diversity makes for the best problem-solving and creative thinking. We are dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team and encourage everyone to apply if your experience is close to what we are looking for.
Blockworks is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.
